content:
Ember’s compilation of voice training tips and guides Most of these are for voice feminization, but the techniques can be used the other way
In no particular order:
Voice Quills’ twitter thread (Nitter mirror) Trans voice lessons (youtube channel) L’s voice training guide (Reddit) AmaRoseLessons (youtube channel) The â€œOne-Stepâ€ To PERFECT Voice Feminization (youtube video) Solid introductory voice training resources (r/transvoice pinned post)

content:
This site does not collect your data or display any ads, however this site is behind cloudflare. so read their privacy policy.
Javascript is only for the lightmode/darkmode toggle and search, the rest of the site is 100% functional without javascript
